name: wantsToTrackMouse(for:in:of:atCharacterIndex:)
desc: Allows an attachment to specify the events for which it tracks the mouse. Required.
declaration:
func wantsToTrackMouse(for theEvent: NSEvent, 
                    in cellFrame: NSRect, 
                    of controlView: NSView?, 
      atCharacterIndex charIndex: Int) -> Bool
